definition: ghost/demon/terrible/damnable/clever/sly/crafty/(suffix for sb with a certain vice or addiction etc)/one of the 28 constellations

sentences.english: Personally, I believe it is in the male genetic code to cheat.
sentences.chinese: 我个人认为，这是男性基因密码在捣鬼。

sentences.english: It is unclear who was behind the stunt.
sentences.chinese: 目前还不清楚是谁在背后捣鬼。

sentences.english: Someone must be at the back of this.
sentences.chinese: 这事一定有人在背后捣鬼。

sentences.english: Cancer stays at home and gives candy to the other trick-or- treaters .
sentences.chinese: 巨蟹座老老实实地待在家里等着给来捣鬼的人糖吃。

definition: to frame sb (by planting sth on them)
to incite/to prompt (sb to do sth)
(coll.) to tamper with/to mess around with
to play dirty tricks/to be up to mischief
to kill secretly/to stab in the back
to sow dissension (idiom); to drive a wedge between
to collude with/to collaborate with/to gang up with
to manipulate from behind the scenes/to pull the strings
to entrap/to set up/to frame (up)/to make false charges against
